wikipedia_page.main: Walter Thompson Welford  (31 August 1916 – 18 September 1990) was a British physicist with expertise in optics.

response: The seventh edition was reviewed by Peter W. Milonni, Eugene Hecht, and William Maxwell Steen. Previous editions of the book were reviewed by Léon Rosenfeld, Walter Thompson Welford, John D. Strong, and Edgar Adrian, among others.
